radiographic_examinations.findings: Suggested the presence of a left inferior parathyroid adenoma.
Revealed a 0.7 x 0.4-cm hypoechoic area in the left lower neck, consistent with a left inferior parathyroid adenoma.
Showed a small nodule posterior to the left lower pole of the thyroid, consistent with a small parathyroid adenoma.
Revealed diffusely increased uptake in the sternum and spine, suggestive of hyperparathyroid bone disease.
